EmailTemplate.name: Corp Comm.Happy Holidays 12-16-2014
EmailTemplate.subject: Happy Holidays
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
EVENT NAME Tagline HEADLINE GOES HERE AND IS ALL CAPS Dear Pivotal Employees,
This special time of year brings with it the opportunity to reflect on how far we've come and express our sincere thanks for all of your hard work.
To help extend holiday greetings to those outside the company, we've created a Pivotal Holiday e-card <https://sites.google.com/a/pivotal.io/pivotal-marketing-programs/2014-holiday-card?pli=1>. It is designed for you to easily send (along with a personalized note) to a customer, partner, vendor or prospect.
Cheers!
Pivotal Marketing
